item.title: Help me with "FunPk"
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

I have this code:

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 3371 && absX <= 3378 && absY >= 3210 && absY <= 3213)) { teleportToX = 3360; teleportToY = 3222; sendMessage("You died in FunPk! But its alright, you didn't lose your items!"); IsDeadTeleporting = true; frame1(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); PoisonDelay = 9999999; KillerId = playerId; }

The only thing that works out of it is the sendMessage. It doesnt tele you to the right place and you lose items. I got it from a tut off another forum. I added it under:

    public boolean ApplyDead() {

How do i make it so you dont lost items/tele to those coords.

Read full topic
